ARABIC: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So today those who have iman are laughing at the kuffar,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, the believers will laugh at the infidels on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But today the believers are laughing at the unbelievers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the Day of Judgment, the believers will laugh at the disbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So this day it is the believers who laugh at the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But this Day those who believe will laugh at the disbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So today those who believe shall laugh at the unbelievers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So today the believers are laughing at the unbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This day it is those who believe who have the laugh of disbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so today those who believe shall [be able to] laugh at those who denied the truth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore Today, those who believed at the infidels are laughing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So today the faithful will laugh at the faithless,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But on this Day the Believers will laugh at the Unbelievers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But this Day (the Day of Resurrection) those who believe will laugh at the disbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But on this Day the believers will laugh at the unbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But on that Day, those who believed will laugh at the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:34] So today, that is, the Day of Resurrection, the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This day) which is the Day of Judgement (it is those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an: i.e. 'Ali and his fellow believers (who have the laugh of disbelievers) who will laugh at the disbelievers,
